references.paper_title: CARLA: An open urban driving simulator
references.reason: This paper introduces CARLA, a simulator used to generate the datasets for the experiments in this paper.
This paper introduces the diffusion models used to generate natural-looking adversarial camouflage.

references.paper_title: Laion-5b: An open large-scale dataset for training next generation image-text models
references.reason: This paper introduces the LAION-5B dataset, which is used to train the diffusion model that is used in the proposed method.
This paper is foundational to the field of adversarial attacks, which is the subject of this paper.

references.paper_title: Dual attention suppression attack: Generate adversarial camouflage in physical world
references.reason: This paper proposes a state-of-the-art baseline method for physical adversarial camouflage that is compared to the proposed method.
